title: Augmented Reality-Based Local Cultural Field Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and fundamental understanding of local culture
context.additional_context: Language education enhancement program for current professionals, combining on-site learning and theoretical application using augmented reality technology.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 80% of major local cultural heritage sites using augmented reality mobile systems.
Learners engage in problem-solving activities with over 90% participation rates in response to virtual scenarios presented during field learning.
Learners achieve scores improved by over 25% compared to pre-assessment in a local cultural identity awareness survey.

resources: Learning activity tracking and analytics system

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
